info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL RIO ARRIBA COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM MDT... At 230 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brazos, or over Tierra Amarilla, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tierra Amarilla, El Vado Lake State Park, Ensenada, Brazos, El Vado, La Puente, Cebolla, Rutheron and Los Ojos. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 167 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
